content: lion brand pattern # 50578-2c *cim-noncho-50578 pdf* * knit version shown * skill level advanced beginner size small large width at widest point 24 28 inches 61 71 cm length 24 28 inches 61 71 cm incredible® article #520 *discontinued* 220 yards crochet hook - size p-15 10 mm safety pin *lion brand notes * this pattern creates an l -shaped piece to wear drape the legs over your shoulders the corner creates a point at the back the openness of the treble_crochet makes it very drapey and also somewhat challenging to measure don t worry if your measurements aren t exact mini-stole versions available **lion® suede article #210 ** crochet 50578-1c 1 knit 50578-1k 2 **incredible® article #520 ** crochet 50578-2c knit 50578-2k 3 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/mini-stole-50578-1c-crochet 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/mini-stole-50578-1k-knit 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/mini-stole-50578-2k-knit
